title: Ticket #6080: Supporting MOUNT_UNDER_SCRATCH for Docker universe jobs
description:
One of the last few nags for Docker on red is the location of /tmp for jobs. The attached patch adds support for MOUNT_UNDER_SCRATCH to Docker jobs.

With EL6, MOUNT_UNDER_SCRATCH mounted job /tmp and /var/tmp under /var/lib/condor/execute. The nodes were partitioned to provide a large amount of space for /var.

With EL7+Docker, /tmp and /var/tmp remain inside the container. Jobs writing to /tmp end up using the Docker LVM pool. The pool is fairly small on red and it Docker jobs hang when it fills up.

The attached patch takes the directories from MOUNT_UNDER_SCRATCH and converts them to "--volume" arguments for docker run, bind mounting them inside the job directory.
remarks: Thanks Derek! Reviewed and pushed into 8.6.1
